content:
Compound 1: 0.31 g (1 mmol) of YCl3·6H2O, 0.21 g (1.4 mmol) of l-tartaric acid (H 2 Tart), 0.08 g (0.5 mmol) of terephthalic acid (H 2 BDC), and 0.14 g (3.5 mmol) of NaOH were dissolved in a mixture of ethanol (6 mL) and distilled water (6 mL). (0.135 g, ca. 30% yield based on Y). Elemental analysis for 1: C12H12O12YNa (M r = 460.12). Calcd: C, 31.29; H, 2.61%. Found: C, 31.3; H, 2.3%.

Compound 2: 0.31 g (1 mmol) of YCl3·6H2O, 0.21 g (1.4 mmol) of l-tartaric acid (H 2 Tart), 0.12 g (0.5 mmol) of biphenyl-4,4′-dicarboxylic acid (H 2 biBDC) and 0.14 g (3.5 mmol) of NaOH were dissolved in a mixture of ethanol (6 mL) and distilled water (6 mL). (0.176 g, ca. 32% yield based on Y). Elemental analysis for 2: C18H16O12YNa (M r = 536.21). Calcd: C, 40.28; H, 2.98%. Found: C, 39.0; H, 3.1%.

In both cases, the reaction mixture was stirred for 2 h at room temperature to homogeneity and then placed in a Teflon-lined stainless vessel (40 mL) and heated to 180 °C for 72 h under autogenous pressure and afterward cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was filtered off, washed thoroughly with ethanol and distilled water, and finally air-dried at room temperature.
clean_text:
Compound 1: 0.31 g (1 mmol) of YCl3⋅6H2O, 0.21 g (1.4 mmol) of l-tartaric acid (H  2  Tart), 0.08 g (0.5 mmol) of terephthalic acid (H  2  BDC), and 0.14 g (3.5 mmol) of NaOH were dissolved in a mixture of ethanol (6 mL) and distilled water (6 mL). (0.135 g, ca. 30% yield based on Y). Elemental analysis for 1: C12H12O12YNa (M r = 460.12). Calcd: C, 31.29; H, 2.61%. Found: C, 31.3; H, 2.3%.

Compound 2: 0.31 g (1 mmol) of YCl3⋅6H2O, 0.21 g (1.4 mmol) of l-tartaric acid (H  2  Tart), 0.12 g (0.5 mmol) of biphenyl-4,4'-dicarboxylic acid (H  2  biBDC) and 0.14 g (3.5 mmol) of NaOH were dissolved in a mixture of ethanol (6 mL) and distilled water (6 mL). (0.176 g, ca. 32% yield based on Y). Elemental analysis for 2: C18H16O12YNa (M r = 536.21). Calcd: C, 40.28; H, 2.98%. Found: C, 39.0; H, 3.1%.

In both cases, the reaction mixture was stirred for 2 h at room temperature to homogeneity and then placed in a Teflon-lined stainless vessel (40 mL) and heated to 180 °C for 72 h under autogenous pressure and afterward cooled to room temperature. The resulting product was filtered off, washed thoroughly with ethanol and distilled water, and finally air-dried at room temperature.
